template.name: readlines
template.value:
# Read the file into a list where each line is an element, and strip the newline characters. with open($filepath$) as text: $linelist$ = text.readlines() $linelist$ = [word.strip("\n") for word in $linelist$]
$END$
template.description: Read in a newline-delimited text file into a list and strip the newline characters off each element
